props.title: Pool member connections
props.query: SELECT average(`f5.poolMember.connections`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Pool member requests
props.query: SELECT average(`f5.poolMember.requestsPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Pool member sessions
props.query: SELECT average(`f5.poolMember.sessions`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Pool member packets in
props.query: SELECT average(`f5.poolMember.packetsReceivedPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Pool member packets out
props.query: SELECT average(`f5.poolMember.packetsSentPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto
